1.content:
Sinjin had always been the weird one at Hollywood Arts, teased, mocked, etc but no more he was tired of it. Recently he had been studying on machines and how to build them. Sinjin was in theater room working on his first invention the body swapper it was a machine with two chairs with wires attached leading to a red button between the chairs. He had just finish with the final touches and wiped the sweat off his face “finally I’m done 4 weeks with no help and teachers asking what I been doing” he said, “now all I need is to try it out on to see if it really works but who”. There was a whole school to try it out on but the first people to pop into his head were Tori the most popular girl that everyone admired and knew, there was also Beck the guy all the girls loved and wanted to go out with, them there was Andre one of Tori’s close friends he could swap with him and get to know Tori a little more, and then there was Cat the one girl he could easily trick into swapping with him.

Right when Sinjin was going to make his mind up the principal called him on the intercom “Sinjin please report to my office I repeat Sinjin please report to my office thank you”. He covered up the machine with a blanket and walked out of the theater. Moments later the door opened and who step in?
1.title: Sinjin builds the body swap machine

11.content:
Tori was checking in on sinjin for a tutoring session she asked him for when she saw the Machine
What’s this Said tori sitting down in one of the chairs,just then something happened and the machine turned on,when tori woke up she was in the body of....

My sister!?” Then, Trina in Tori’s body ran into the theater, freaking out. Trina said “Ok! What happened!? I’m in your body, and your in mine!” Tori then realized it was the machine, she pointed to it and said “There! That machine, it switched our bodies!” They both groaned, ‘whoever build this is gonna pay’ both of them thought. They walked together out of the theater to find that person, they eventually ran into...
111.title: Trina

113.content: Tori said “Huh? What happened?” Then she noticed “Wait, this isn’t my voice.” She said it calmly however, as the voice was smoothing, she pulled out Cat’s phone’s camera and see what happened, she and Cat switched bodies. She sighed and said “I’m in Cat’s body? Great...” She then saw Cat on her own body happily having fun, then she saw herself and said “Wow! Hey Tori! I’m assuming your in my body.” She nodded, and Cat smiled again “Ok, good. I’m in your body now, and it’s so much fun.” Tori said “Of course it is.” Cat then noticed the machine, she said “Did that machine switch our bodies?” Tori realized it and said “Yes, it did. That must be a body switching machine.” Cat said “Then let’s find the person who build it.” Tori then said surprisingly “Actually, that’s a good idea.” She needed to know who build the machine, so she and Cat exited the theater and eventually ran into...

Robbie’s POV as he walked in
12.content: Beck and Jade came in, arguing. Jade said “Why won’t you let me live with you? My family hates me!” She was in tears, hoping he would co-op with her, sadly, Beck sighed and said “Why would all of your family hate you? Your dad loved your play!” Jade yelled in rage “Yeah, he liked it, but he still didn’t like my style, like my earrings!” Beck said “I’m sure, we can help you work something out with your family, please Jade. Moving in with me is not the answer.” He hugged her to calm her down, he really didn’t want to see her like this. She yelled in rage and sadness “If you can’t see what I’ve suffered with my awful life, then I wish that you were me, so you know what it was like, then maybe that will help you see that you need to save me!” She banged on a machine, which turned on, they both stopped arguing for a second and looked at it. They both got scared, Beck said “Jade?...what did you do now?” Jade said “I didn’t mean to, my sweet Beck! I thought there was nothing there!” Then the light flashed, and they both screamed in fear as they held onto each other tight, then the light was gone and they both fainted into each other’s arms.
12.title: Beck and Jade arguing

13.content: Cat entered. Did she need his help with an acting assignment?
13.title: Cat

choices: She was hiding a puppy she found
132.title: Another reason she was there.

1321.content:
Cat went running in the theater and put a chair in front of the door. Cat was hiding from Jade because at lunch she was showing Jade a product she had bought online that would clean anything within seconds. She had put a pair of Jade’s favorite scissors in the machine and instead of cleaning them it ended up destroying them so since then she has been hiding from Jade.
There was loud bagging at the door.

“CAT I KNOW YOUR IN THERE OPEN THIS DOOR!” Jade shouted. “I JUST WANT TO TALK THATS ALL!”

Cat nervously walked up to the door and leaned against it

“Your not gonna hurt me?” Cat replied

“No I just want to talk that’s all we can talk right Cat we’re friends.” Jade said.

Cat moved the chair and unlocked the door. Jade open the the door and walked in. She closed the door behind her and locked it. Jade walked up to cat and told her to take a seat. Cat did what she was told but she had sat on one of the chairs from Sinjin’s machine.

“So what did you want to talk to me about?” Cat said quietly. “I already told you I’m sorry for breaking your scissors. I didn’t know the machine was gonna do that.”

Jade smiles and shook her head.
“Those weren’t just any scissors Cat those were my FIRST SCISSORS the first scissors I have ever gotten I always carry them around with me for good luck and now there gone. Their is no way to get another pair like that so I need you to go out after school and I find a pair that looks like the ones I use to have.” She demanded.

Jade sat down on the other chair that was attached to the machine. She stretched her arms out and accidentally pushed the button. Both there bodies froze in place unable to move.

“Cat what’s going on?” Jade said.

“I didn’t do anything I swear I can’t move.” Cat replied.

From both there point of views it seemed like the room was spinning faster and faster till they both blacked out.
1321.title: She was hiding from Jade

choices: Play it off act like Cat
13211.content:
Jade slowly started opening her eyes. Her head felt like some one was banging it over and over.

“Man what happened that felt really weird”. She said covering her mouth. “That’s not my voice.”

She looked down at her self and saw the same pink dress and pink flats that Cat was wearing and to make matters worse cats red hair fell down in her face. Jade turned her head and saw her body unconscious in the other chair.

“This can’t be happing I’m dreaming I have to be dreaming this can’t be real how can I be in Cats body?” She said.

Jade got up and walked over to her body and started shaking in.

“Wake up Cat are you in my body CAT!” She shouted.

Jade saw her eyes opening slowly then they got wide as her body pushed her to the ground.

“Get away from me I’m Cat not you.” Cat said.

She got up from the chair and ran out of the theater.

“Cat wait come back it’s me Jade we switched bodies.” She yelled

Jade went running out of the theater after Cat but she was no where in sight. She saw Robbie getting a drink from the juice machine she walked over to him. She grabbed his jacket and pinned him against the machine.

“Did you see where cat went” she asked

“Cat what’s wrong with you?” Robbie replied in pain. “You are Cat.”

That’s when she remember she was Cat.
13211.title: Jade’s pov

choices: Cat, feeling scared in Jade’s body.
132112.content:
Jade sighed and decided to tell him, he left go of him, which he sighed in relief.

Jade said “Robbie, it’s me...Jade...that stupid swap body machine in the theater room made this happen.”

Robbie was then shocked and scared, his poor kitty Cat was in a very scary but good looking body, Robbie looked at Jade and said “Ok, I believe you, Jade. My poor kitty Cat...for once, I agree with you to hurt someone who build that stupid machine!”

Then Jade remembered a friend Cat has, and was also surprised Robbie acted this way, he must really care about her.

Jade smiled and says “Ok. I think I know of a friend who can help us out.”

They left the school and went over to Sam and Cat’s house.

Sam was watching TV, when she heard the door ring, she groaned and walked up to the door.

Sam opened the door to see Robbie and Cat there.

Sam said “Hey love birds, what’s up? Got a show I need to get back on.”

Cat then said “Sam, it’s me...Jade...” Sam then widened her eyes and started at them saying “Ok. What happened?”

Robbie said “There was a stupid machine that swaps bodies, and Cat and Jade were there when it turned on by accident, they were in the theater when this happened, can you help us find Cat and the person behind the machine?”

Knowing her best friend was in danger, she said “Of course I’ll help you, poor kid, I hope she’s ok.”

They went back and rode on Sam’s motorcycle, since they got here using Cat’s bike since Jade didn’t have access to her car, and Sam’s motorcycle was cool.

They got back to Hollywood arts to find...
132112.title: Tell Robbie the truth

1322.content:
Cat had found a puppy on her way to school and she didn’t want anyone to tell on her so she thought the best place to hide it was in the theater room since there was no class to be scheduled in there today.

“Don’t worry little guy no one will find you in here” Cat said. “After school I’ll be back to pick you up okay try not to get yourself in trouble okay.”
1322.title: She was hiding a puppy she found

13221.content:
Moments later Tori walked into the theater. There was play auditions happening for next weeks play and Tori was determined to get the main role thus she went to the theater to get some private practice.

“Okay Tori you’ve stared in other plays in Hollywood Arts you can do this.” She said to herself.

When the puppy notice notice Tori he started doing his puppy cry. Tori confused looked around til she saw the puppy hiding behind one of the machine chairs. She walked over to him and picked him up and placed him on top of the chair.

“How did you get in here little guy? You have some talent.” She laughed

Tori pulled the other chair next to the puppy with the helmet still attached and sat down. The puppy started to get hyper and leaned over the chair.
13221.title: Tori walks in

choices: The puppy finds a way out of the theater
132211.content:
The puppy leaned a little to far out and ended up hitting the button. Electricity came out of both helmets and stuck Tori and the puppy.

“What’s happening, what did you do puppy?.” Tori said.

There was a flash and everything went black. A few moments later Tori woke up. At first her vision was blurry, but as it became clearer she realized her vision was in black and white. She also realized that everything around her seemed bigger.

“What happened did I shrink or something?” She thought.

Tori look over the chair to notice the ground was much more farther down. She turned to see if the puppy was okay but was shocked to see her own body laying unconscious in the chair.

“Bark bark bark.” Tori said.

Instead of words coming out of her mouth just little puppy barks came out. She knew this was bad because there would be no way for her to communicate with anyone. Suddenly Tori saw her body starting to wake up. Her body got off the chair and got on her hands and knees.

“Bark bark bark” Tori tried talking again

The puppy in her body looked at her and started barking too. The puppy in her body walked over to Tori and gave her a lick on the face.

“Eww that’s not what my tongue is for puppy.” she said to herself.
132211.title: The puppy pushes the button

choices: With Cat, at Sam and Cat’s house.
1322111.content:
Then Cat comes back in, and saw Tori with the puppy, she ran over scared saying “Tori! Please don’t tell the school! The puppy is so cute!”

Upon seeing Cat however, the puppy went and jumped on her happily, not knowing he was in Tori’s body. This knocked Cat over, as she screamed.

Cat seeing Tori like this confused her, but then Cat thought of it and said “Good puppy?” The puppy smiled and licked Cat’s face, Cat smiled and giggled “Ok. A ha ha ha. Good puppy.” She patted him, then she said “So if your the puppy, then where’s...” then she saw the puppy’s body.

Tori thought “Oh good! Cat!” Tori then jumped onto Cat, snuggling with her. Cat smiled and said “Tori! It is you! How did you and the puppy switch bodies?”

Tori then pointed with her puppy paw at the body swap machine, Cat examined it and saw a label that said “Body Swap Machine. Created by Sinjin.” Cat said “Sinjin? He made this machine, that switch you and the puppy’s bodies?”

Tori then realized this and nodded, thinking “Once we switch back, I’m going to kill Sinjin.”

Cat knew she had no choice now, so she had Tori and the puppy hide behind curtains, saying “Stay here. Please be quiet. I’ll be quick.” And she ran out of the theater, leaving behind the puppy and a confused Tori, she went to Principle Helen’s office, saying “Principle Helen!”

Helen saw Cat and said “Yes, Cat? What is it? Shouldn’t you be in class?”

Cat came up with a good lie “Yes, but I got a call from my family, so I went out into the hall, excusing myself from class, and they told me to come home, because my brother thinks he’s evil and they need my help, and Tori’s also sick.”

Helen thought this maybe like Crazy Steve, so she said “Is he crazy?” Cat sadly said “Yes, but-“ “Go child! I’ll excuse you for the rest of the day! Go help your family!” Helen said, wanting to have no more crazy people in the world. She also said “And tell Tori she can go too, and hope she feels better.”

Cat smiled and said “Thank you, Principle Helen! Bye!” She exited the office, Helen sighed and said “And I thought Crazy Steve was crazy.”

Cat went back into the auditorium and said “Hi you two.” The puppy and Tori were happy upon seeing her. Cat carried Tori and had the puppy follow her as they exited the school without being noticed. Then Cat got her bicycle, and they went to a pharmacy store. Cat put a strap around the puppy’s human hand, and to a pole, so the puppy wouldn’t escape, she knew Tori would stay and not run away. She said “Ok you two. I’ll be back.”

She went into the pharmacy, as Tori waited patiently with the puppy, who snugged with Tori. Tori then thought in relief “Thanks, Cat. Now we need to figure out how to find Sinjin to make him switch us back.”

Cat then walked out of the pharmacy with something in her hands, saying “Ok. Now let’s go to my place.” She got the puppy, Tori, and her bicycle and left the area, they arrived at Sam and Cat’s house, as she parked her bicycle. She went in with both of them, as Sam looked at her from the couch and said “Hey kid. Your home...early...what is happening?”

Cat put the Tori next to Sam saying “I’ll explain in a minute, Sam.” She had the puppy follow Cat into the bathroom, in which she closed the door. Sam shrugged and said “Ok.” She looked at the puppy and said “Hey there. Cute puppy.” She patted him, not knowing its Tori, Tori smiled and thought “That actually feels good. No wonder the puppy likes getting patted.”

In the bathroom, the puppy was sitting down on the floor, as Cat got opened the package she got, and pulled out a big diaper. Cat knows the puppy wouldn’t follow how humans use the bathroom, so Cat had to do this so there wouldn’t be any trouble. Cat said “Ok, puppy. Lie down.” The puppy listened, and laid down for Cat. Then Cat pulled Tori’s pants and panties off her body. Cat then unfolded the diaper and lifted Tori’s legs, and slide the diaper under her butt. Then she put Tori’s legs down, as she then taped the diaper on her body. She then put the panties away, but pulled Tori’s pants back up over the diaper. Cat then had the puppy sat up, and hugged him smiling saying “Good puppy.” The puppy smiled too, liking the comfort he was given to his human butt, thinking people must be glad to have this on. Then, Cat has the puppy follow her back to Tori and Sam.

The puppy lied on the couch, smiling. Tori thought “Ok, puppy. That’s not how I lie down.” Sam was confused and said “Ok, Cat. What is going on?” Cat then said “Ok, Sam. There’s a body swap machine Sinjin build, and it happened to swap the bodies of Tori and a cute puppy I found. Now, we have to watch them until we find Sinjin and switch their bodies back.” Sam at first, thought Cat was just joking, but then she looked at Tori’s body, as she had her tongue sticking out, happily painting. That’s what a puppy would do. Tori thought “Ok. I know your happy puppy. I’m just glad we’re safe.” Sam then widened her eyes and said to Cat “Wow, kid. That’s some story. Ok, I’ll help you, but you clean the messes while I help find that Sinjin kid.” Cat smiled and said “Thank you so much, Sam. That would be wonderful.” She hugged Sam, and she reminded her “Not a hugger.” Cat quickly ended the hug, but Sam smiled and said “Alright, let’s do this kid.” They bumped butts as they waved and Sam exited the house saying “Make sure they don’t cause trouble, ok kid?” Cat said “Promise, bye Sam!” Sam said “Bye, Cat!” Then the mission begins, Cat watching Tori and the puppy at home, while Sam goes to Hollywood Arts to find Sinjin.
1322111.title: Cat comes back

choices: Some time passes and Sam comes back
13221112.content:
“Okay first thing first you need a name puppy how about I call you Buddy how does that sound?” Cat said.

The puppy started getting all excited about his new name. Buddy kept on trying to eat his hair that kept falling in his face. Cat ran to the restroom and grabbed a ponytail to tie back Tori’s hair so buddy wouldn’t eat it.

“Man this sucks I can’t communicate with Cat at all.” Tori though, “and I’m so hungry wait a minute I know.”

“Woof woof woof woof.” Tori said.

“Are you hungry Tori.” Cat said as she reached into her bag from the pharmacy, “I got this bag of dog food at the pharmacy for you.”

Cat grabbed a bowl from the kitchen and put food in it. She walked back over to the living room and put the bowl on the floor. Buddy quickly ran over to it but Cat grabbed him.

“Sorry Buddy but that’s dog food and while your in Tori’s body you eat human food.” She said.

Buddy made a sad face while Tori looked at the dog food.

“Eww I guess I don’t have a choice right now.” She thought.

Tori started eating the food slowly and realized it wasn’t that bad. She started eating it faster while Cat walked over to the kitchen with Buddy. Cat told Buddy to sit and he did as he was told. All the food in the fridge was nothing but junk food that Sam bought but that’s when she saw a bucket of fried chicken Sams favorite food. Cat put a chicken leg on the floor and Buddy started eating it right away.

“Okay that solves that problem.” Cat said.

Tori walked into the kitchen after finishing her dog food and saw the chicken leg that her body was eating. Her dog senses started kicking in she walked over to the chicken leg and Buddy started growling.

“Dang didn’t know my growl would sound that pissed off. Tori thought.

Cat picked up Tori and placed her on the table. She started scratching Tori’s head.

“Aww no wonder dogs like this.” Tori though.

Just then Buddy started whimpering. Cat looked at him and realized he was trying to scratch his head but couldn’t do it with Tori’s boots on.

“You need help buddy?” Cat said.

She sat Buddy on his butt and pulled off Tori’s boots and socks. Buddy then extended his leg to the back of his head and started scratching. Cat looked over at Tori and started laughing.

“It’s so funny hahaha he’s using your feet to scratch himself hahah I didn’t even know you were that flexible either.” Cat said laughing.

“Neither did I.” Tori thought.
13221112.title: With Cat, at Sam and Cat’s house.

1322112.content: Does the puppy in Tori’s body run out as soon as Trina opens the door?
1322112.title: Trina walks in

132213.content:
“Yo Vega!” Someone said. Tori knew that voice. It was Jade! She had to hide the puppy, fast! She quickly picked him up and ran to the curtains, and placed the puppy under the curtains, saying “Stay quiet, little puppy. I’ll be back.”

She ran back to the chairs, then Jade walks in, saying “So, Tori, you auditioning for next weeks play?”

Tori stay calmed and said “Yes, I am. Are you?” Jade says “Obviously, I am. And what the heck is that?” She pointed at the machine, and Tori really didn’t notice at first, because she was focused on the puppy, but now she sees the whole machine, and is amazed.

Tori said “I really don’t know, to be honest. What could to be?”

Both girls then examined the machine, seeing a button panel, as well as 2 chairs with helmets. The puppy was staying quiet, but was getting bored.
132213.title: Jade walks in

14.content: Robbie walked in and saw the machine, he said “Oh, a machine. Wonder what it is.” He read the label and it read “Body Swapping Machine: made by Sinjin”. Robbie smiled and said “Well, Sinjin, you’ve done it again, I might as well try this out and see if it works.” He put himself in one of the chairs and pretended to get stuck to get someone to help him, he smiled and think of the possible people he could switch with, he put Rex in his back pack and put it to the side so he wouldn’t accidentally switch with him. There was Tori and Trina, the Vega sisters, both good looking with talent, Tori has more talent than Trina, but Trina did show some of her talent, both would be nice to be in, there’s also Beck, the ladies man, Andre, his close friend of him and Tori, so she could knew her a little better, and, his most loved girl, Cat, who she would be easily tricked into switching with him. So he put the plan to the test and did a fake scared yell “Help! I’m stuck in this chair!” Someone heard his fake help and came into the theater, it was...
14.title: Robbie

choices: The helmet fell off Robbie and landed on his backpack
142.content:
Robbie knew who he wanted to switch with (Tori) who wouldn’t everyone knows her she’s basically the most talented one at Hollywood Art’s. Trina came in second place but she only had looks not talent unless being a terrible singer is a talent. Robbie sat himself down on one of the chairs and put on a helmet.

"Okay let’s do this. HELP HELP IM STUCK.” He started yelling. “SOMEBODY PLEASE HELP ME.”

Moments later Tori came running into the theater. She looked worried and looked around the room. That’s when she saw Robbie sitting in the chair with the helmet on. Tour ran over to him.

“Robbie you okay what happened I heard your yelling from the hallway?” She ask concerned.

Robbie looked at Tori and smirked. He grabbed her and pushed her into one of the chairs the helmet fell on her head. He quickly pushed the button and there was a bright flash.L.
142.title: Tori

choices: Beck and Andre are in the lunch area
She runs into her sister Trina
1421.content:
Robbie slowly opened his eyes his vision was a little blurry. He could see smoke coming from the machine, rubbing his eyes Robbie noticed well him his body was laying in the other chair meaning the machine really worked. His hands were now feminine and slender and so was his figure. He grabbed his small boobs and gave them a squeeze a shock of pleasure went through his body.

“Tori I am going to enjoy this body I promise you that.” He said to himself.

Moments later Tori now in Robbie’s body woke up. She rubbed her eyes and immediately started screaming when she saw herself standing in front of her. Robbie slapped her shutting her up.

“What did you do Robbie why am I you and your me?” Tori said. “You better fix this because I don’t want to be you I want to be me again.”

Robbie crossed his arms and gave an evil smirk on his face.

“Yeah I bet you would want to return to your own body sweet Tori, but ever since I came to this school I been made fun of, called weird because I always carry around a puppet, never got the girls.” Robbie said. “Well all that is about to change because I’m the popular one now and I have all your talent I’m not giving up this body Tori so get use to being me.”

Robbie picked up his backpack with Rex in it and stormed out the theater. Tori was just shocked no words to say she just saw her friend that she’s known from day one just leave with her body. She picked up Robbies glasses which had fallen off during the switch and walked out of the theater and into the hallway. Tori didn’t see her body anywhere.

“I need to tell someone what just happened maybe Andre and Beck will believe me if I tell them.” She said to herself.
1421.title: The switch worked

choices: They went to look for Robbie in Tori’s body.
Cat comes home first before they leave.
14211.content:
Tori was walking to see if anyone she trusts can help her, mainly Beck and Andre. When she entered the lunch area, she actually saw not just Beck and Andre, but her body, Robbie was there, chatting with them. Knowing she had to catch him, she gave chase to him, saying “There you are! Now you get back here!” Robbie then turned to see Tori charging at him, so he waved at Beck and Andre and made a run for it, leaving the 2 boys confused.

Since Robbie had Tori’s body, he ran faster, but still had to hide, someplace safe.

Tori was exhausted, Robbie wasn’t as fast of a runner, so she was having trouble catching up to him in his body, she said “Dang it. He’s so fast. How am I supposed to catch up to him now?”

Tori tried to think of how to get Robbie to come back, suddenly, she got an idea, she said “I think I know one place I could go to.”

So she took Robbie’s bike to Sam and Cat’s place, hoping to get some help.

She rang the doorbell, Sam was watching TV and she got up to answer the door, she saw Robbie. Sam said “Cat’s not here, Robweird. What do you want?” Tori thought ‘Cat’s not here, maybe I can tell Sam the truth, then she can help me.’ Tori said “Sam. It’s me. Tori.” Sam just laughed after a moment, and said “Yeah, and I’m Freddie. That’s so balony. Mmm. Balony.”

Tori got pissed off at her, so she said “You want proof it’s me? Fine! You and Cat had to face Nona that day Dice got kidnapped, and you managed to defeat her. But you didn’t tell the boys, so they wouldn’t freak out.” Sam stopped laughing and looked at her seriously, she said “Woah. Is that really you, Tori?” Tori nodded. Sam said “Let me guess, a body swapping machine that Robbie used.”

Tori said “Pretty much.” Sam said “Alright, I’ll help you, he couldn’t have gone far.” Tori smiled and said “Thanks so much, Sam.”
14211.title: She sees her body

14212.content:
Tori knew that Andre and Beck could probably figure something out to fix this mess. If anything they probably know where Robbie went. It was 5mins to lunch so she knew where they would be at.

(At the lunch area)

Beck had just gotten his lunch and met Andre on the table. He notice Andre putting a lot of salt on his fries.

“What you doing there man?” Beck asked.

“Putting more salt on my fries because these fries are not salty enough. How you gonna give me fries but don’t add enough salt on them.” Andre replied. “Anyways where’s Jade at?”

“Oh she stayed after class to talk to Sikowitz about a play she wants to do.” Beck answered.

“Does it involve scissors and gore?” Andre said.

“Indeed it does.” Said Beck.

Just then Tori arrived at the lunch area. She saw where Beck and Andre were and ran over to them.

“Hey Rob.” They both said. “Where’s Rex?”

“Rex isn’t with me because I’m not Robbie it’s me Tori.” She said.

Both Andre and Beck busted out laughing. Tori just had a pissed off look on her face.

“Yeah and I’m cat.” Andre said jokingly.

“Fine you guys want me to prove it I will.” Tori demanded, “Andre you had a crush on Jade at one point so you wrote a song for her and Beck you did my stunt devil job because I was to chicken to do it.”

Both of them stop laughing and we’re completely shocked.

“Tori it’s really you?” Beck ask, “how did this happen to you?”

“Yes it’s me that’s what I been trying to tell you.” She said.

Tori explained everything that happened between her and Robbie before lunch. She ask them to follow her to the theater so she can show them the machine.
14212.title: Beck and Andre are in the lunch area

choices: Robbie in Tori’s body walked in, and heard Cat’s speech.
Robbie doesn’t come, but Tori remembers Cat’s speech to tel him later.
142122.content:
They went into the theater, and saw the machine there, Andre and Beck examined it and looked pretty impressive, they noticed buttons and which ones did what, so they would figure out how to switch Tori and Robbie back.

Tori said “See? That machine did this to us!”

Beck said “Ok. I think I know how we can switch them back, but we’re going to need Cat’s help.”

Tori said “But we’re not going to tell her the truth, right?”

Andre said “Don’t worry, Tori. We would never do that to Cat, it would break her sweet loving heart. But you will pretend to be Robbie, since you are in his body, and you are going to ask her to give a speech about how she feels about Robbie.”

Tori understood what was the plan and said “So, then Cat’s speech will convince Robbie that being himself isn’t so bad?”

Beck nodded and said “Of course, it’s full proof.”

Andre said “And we’ll be there in case anything goes wrong.”

Tori smiled and nodded and texted Cat to come into the theater, and the boys hide behind some curtains.

Soon after, Sam and Cat entered the theater.

Cat said “Hi Robbie! What do you wanna talk to me about?” Sam said “Better be quick, cause we got a babysitting job today.”

Tori thought ‘Well, here goes nothing.’ She smiled and said “Can you make a speech about if I’m perfect just the way I am?”

Cat blushed and breathed, she said “Robbie...I...”

Sam said “Give us a moment, Robweird.” She grabbed Cat and ran out of the theater, she put her hands on her shoulders and looked at her and said “Cat! This is your big chance! Go for it!”

Cat smiled and said “You really think I can do this Sam? I’m so nervous.”

Sam said “I know you can kid. I believe in you. Tell him how much he means to you.”

Cat was so happy she said “Ok, Sam! I will!”

Sam smiled and said “That’s the spirit, kid! Now, go! Go! Go!” She pushed her encouragingly and Cat went to Robbie and happily said “Robbie, I would be happy to make a great speech about you!”

Tori was relieved and happy, this might work after all.
142122.title: The machine is still there

14213.content:
Tori saw her sister, Trina. She hated to do this, but Trina could be a huge help, so she went up to her and said “Trina!” Trina sees Robbie and says “What do you want, dork?” Tori decided to say something Robbie would never say “Let’s Make it Shine!” Then Trina’s eyes widened and was shocked, she said “T...Tori? Is that you?...” Tori said “Yes, sadly.” Trina then said “What happened?”

“There was a stupid machine that swaps bodies and Robbie used that to switch with me.” Tori said.

Trina said “However build that machine is dead. But first, let’s get some help to find Robbie.” Trina then smiled and said “And I think I know who can really help us.” Tori got confused as Trina took her hand and pulled her to Cat.

Cat was with Sam, as they were about to go home when Trina and Robbie came to them, Cat said “Hi Trina! Why are you with Robbie?” Sam said “S’up?”

Trina said “This is actually Tori, Cat. There was a body swap machine that Robbie tricked her and they swapped bodies.”

Cat eyes widened, as well as Sam’s, Sam shockingly said “Ok, I don’t believe you, that’s balony, mmm, I could go for some Balony right now.” Cat said “Wait, Sam! They could be right.” Sam sighed and said “Ok, ask away then.” Cat looked into Robbie’s eyes and said “Tori? Is that really you?” Cat had eyes in her tears as she looked and felt sad, Tori really didn’t want to do this, but she had too.

Tori sadly said “Yes, Cat is me, Tori.” That really strikes Cat in the heart, as she said sadly “Oh my...Robbie...why would you do this...you...you were my love...Robbie!” She started to cry and sob and she hugged Sam tight, and buried her head into her chest. Sam hugged her back and rubbed her head and back, saying “It’s ok, kid. I’m here.”

Cat continued to sob, but started to calm down to silent sobs, as Sam kept on hugging her. Tori really felt her heart break on seeing that, Trina really felt bad for Cat too, but knowing her plan would work, then someone came onto the scene.

info.brief_description: What happens when Sinjin builds a body swap machine in the world of Victorious
info.description:
The cast of Victorious are all here including the cast of Sam and Cat

Anyone is free to add to this story write what comes to mind make this interactive long and fun

-You can add characters just make sure they have a introduction or backstory of how they got there
-Sexual content is allowed
-gay content is allowed to an extent
-no two sentence characters unless it’s for a choice
-Just have fun and enjoy
